questions.question: What is the dominant textual element depicted prominently and centrally in the provided image, conveying crucial information regarding the product's nutritional composition?

Based on the label, what is the total calorie count for a single serving, as numerically indicated in the image?
What is the amount of protein, in grams, that is visually evident in this image's nutritional information?
According to the presented label, how many grams of total fat are contained in one serving of this particular product?
Observing the textual data, what numerical value represents the percentage of the daily value for total fat contained within this particular food item's serving size?
As shown on the label, how many milligrams of sodium does a single serving of this product contain?
Based on the label's information, what is the percentage of the daily value for sodium found within this product's serving size?
What is the amount of fiber, in grams, that this food product's nutritional label clearly and numerically specifies?
In accordance with the visible nutritional information, what is the percentage of the daily value for fiber within one serving of the food item?
According to the nutrition facts presented visually, how many grams of total sugars are included in one serving of the product?
Based on the provided image, what percentage of the daily value is represented by the added sugars found within one serving of the food item?
